org.activebpel.rt.bpel.impl.lock
Class AeExclusiveLockRequest

java.lang.Object
  org.activebpel.rt.bpel.impl.lock.AeLockRequest
      org.activebpel.rt.bpel.impl.lock.AeExclusiveLockRequest
class AeExclusiveLockRequest
extends AeLockRequest

Extension of the base lock request that will only acquire the lock if it's the only lock holder present.

Field Summary

Method Summary
protected  boolean canLock()
          Returns true if all of the requested variables can be locked immediately and exclusively
 boolean isExclusiveRequest()

Constructor Detail

AeExclusiveLockRequest

public AeExclusiveLockRequest(AeVariableLocker aVariableLocker,
                              java.util.Set aVariablesToLock,
                              java.lang.String aOwner,
                              IAeVariableLockCallback aCallback)
Creates a lock request with all of its required data.

Parameters:
aVariablesToLock - - The set of variable paths that we want to lock
aOwner - - The path of the object that will be the owner of the lock
aCallback - - The callback that gets used if we can't fulfill the request immediately
